Class FolderChangeWatcher

All Implemented Interfaces:
com.telenav.kivakit.collections.watcher.CollectionChangeWatcher<FileSystemObject>, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Broadcaster, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Listener, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.MessageTransceiver, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Repeater, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Transceiver, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.lifecycle.Operation, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.lifecycle.Startable, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.messaging.Receiver, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.messaging.Transmitter, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.Nameable, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.NamedObject
public class FolderChangeWatcher extends com.telenav.kivakit.collections.watcher.PeriodicCollectionChangeWatcher<FileSystemObject>
Watches for changes to the contents of a Folder. CollectionChangeListeners are notified when changes occur. Listeners can be added with BaseCollectionChangeWatcher.addListener(CollectionChangeListener) and removed with BaseCollectionChangeWatcher.removeListener(CollectionChangeListener).

Collection Change Listeners

  • BaseCollectionChangeWatcher.addListener(CollectionChangeListener)
  • BaseCollectionChangeWatcher.removeListener(CollectionChangeListener)

Protected Callbacks

  • BaseCollectionChangeWatcher.onAdded(Object)
  • BaseCollectionChangeWatcher.onModified(Object)
  • BaseCollectionChangeWatcher.onRemoved(Object)
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
